You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesS S] > &sup2

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&sup2;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00b2/index.htm U+000B2].
  * `&sup2` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00b2/index.htm U+000B2].
